spacecraft_description: J.R. Ward's "Dark Lover" is the first novel in the Black Dagger Brotherhood series, a paranormal romance saga featuring an ancient race of vampire warriors who protect their species from enemies while struggling with their own demons. The story centers on Wrath, the last pure-bred vampire on earth and reluctant leader of the Black Dagger Brotherhood, who must protect Beth Randall, a half-breed vampire, as she undergoes her dangerous transition into immortality. Set in a contemporary urban environment, the novel blends intense romance with supernatural action, featuring immortal warriors, ancient bloodlines, and a secret society hidden within modern civilization. Ward's work established many conventions of the paranormal romance genre while creating a complex mythology around vampire culture and society. Note: This paranormal romance appears to be miscategorized in this science fiction collection, as it focuses on supernatural rather than scientific or technological themes.
